title: Exercise Regularly
description: Engage in at least 30 minutes of moderate exercise most days of the week to maintain good physical health.

title: Eat a Balanced Diet
description: Consume a variety of fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and whole grains for a well-rounded nutritional intake.

title: Get Sufficient Sleep
description: Aim for 7-9 hours of quality sleep each night to support overall well-being and cognitive function.

title: Stay Hydrated
description: Drink an adequate amount of water daily to maintain proper hydration levels in the body.

title: Regular Health Check-ups
description: Schedule routine health check-ups and screenings as recommended by your healthcare provider.

title: Manage Stress
description: Practice relaxation techniques or mindfulness to reduce stress and promote mental health.

title: Limit Alcohol Intake
description: Moderate alcohol consumption and be aware of its effects on overall health.

title: Avoid Smoking
description: Quit smoking and avoid exposure to secondhand smoke to protect lung and overall health.
